Name: Le Hollandais
Review Text: Amazing take away Menu! We have ordered at many restaurants during covid times and this was by far the best fine dining take out experience we have had. Exceptionally good price quality ratio. We could tell that all ingredients were fresh and also appreciate the plastic free packaging! We will definitely order again.

Name: Le Hollandais
Review Text: Nice restaurant. Mix of dutch and french cuisine. The staff was amazing and really helpful. Pretty decent selection of wines. Ambience with a lot of personality.

Name: Le Hollandais
Review Text: Excellent restaurant with very friendly staff. The seafood sausage was out of this world and the Brittany style seafood soup was a good lead in. The cheese board and their generous servings (despite two of us sharing a plate) was the perfect end.

Name: Le Hollandais
Review Text: We came here for our wedding anniversary, and had the 4 course chef's menu. The food was fine, but quite bland. The people are nice, but I got the impression that this place is past its peak years.

Name: Le Hollandais
Review Text: Still one of the better restaurants of Amsterdam after so many years. Excellent food, kind and attentive service. Extensive winelist. For this quality prices are quite reasonable.
